Package model

Class OODStocks

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.OODStocks
  • public class OODStocks
extends java.lang.Object
    The OODStocks object is used for storing all the stocks that have been made during a stock programs run time. It allows for the assurance, that multiple of the same stock are not created (see the constructor SimpleStock(String tckr)). This class also has the directory path to the where the stock info is stored (which is public because stock info can be found anywhere, but BE MINDFUL for future implementation that this directory path is public). This class also offers the ability to create(String) add new stock info file, and manipulate the stocks field that keeps track of all stocks made.

      Returns a Stock with the given ticker name, either creating a new stock if there hasn't been one made, or returning the stock with the ticker, that is already in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • putStock

        public static void putStock​(Stock stock)
        Adds a stock, to the stocks being kept track of.
        Parameters:
        stock - the stock to be added to the stocks.

      • create

        public static void create​(java.lang.String ticker)
        Creates a new stock file with the given ticker. If the stock file does not exist, then the method will fetch the stock data from the API and write it to the file. If the stock data is not found, then the method will return without creating a stock info.
        Parameters:
        ticker - the ticker of the stock to be created.

      • getStock

        public static Stock getStock​(java.lang.String ticker)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the stock object with the given ticker. If the stock does not exist, then a IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        ticker - the ticker of the stock to be returned.
        Returns:
        the stock object with the given ticker.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the stock does not exist.

      • getStocks

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Stock> getStocks()
        Returns a copy of the stocks being kept track of.
        Returns:
        a copy of the stocks being kept track of.

      • removeStock

        public static Stock removeStock​(java.lang.String ticker)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Removes the stock with the given ticker from the stocks being kept track of.
        Parameters:
        ticker - the ticker of the stock to be removed.
        Returns:
        the stock that was removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the stock does not exist.

      • getStockOrMakeNew

        public static Stock getStockOrMakeNew​(java.lang.String ticker)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a Stock with the given ticker name, either creating a new stock if there hasn't been one made, or returning the stock with the ticker, that is already in the database.
        Parameters:
        ticker - the ticker of the stock.
        Returns:
        the stock with the given ticker.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the stock does not exist locally.
